kese wethath, mema thiranayata wirodhaya pala kirima sandaha awadanam sahitha rajakariwalin iwathwimata shri lanka pashu waidya niladharinge sangamaya thiranaya kala.thrikunamalaye sita girithale pashu waidya karyalayata ragenawith thibu walaseku pradeshawasinta hiruhara karamin sitiyadi pereda wanajiwi niladharin mara dama thibuna.me athara, walasage paharakamen thuwala labu pudgalayage suwaduk wimasima sandaha wanajiwi sanrakshana niyojya amathya palitha thewarapperuma ada polonnaruwa maha rohalata paminiya.pasuwa niyojya amathyawaraya, girithale pashu waidya karyalayata pamina mema gataluwa pilibandawa karunu soya baluwa.

idama saha niwasaya miladi ganimata pawum 2,600 k gewana ladi. 1926 desambar brithanya bauddha dharmadutha sangamayata mudal ekathu kara ganima pinisa lankawata paminima. 1927 indiyawata perala yama saha saranathhi mula gandhakuti wiharaye idikirim katayuthu arambaima. 1930 mulagandhakuti wiharaye idikirim katayuthu sampurna kirima. 1931 awasan warata lakdiwata paminima saha anagarika dharmapala bharakara aramudala pihituwima. 1931 juli 13 siridewamiththa dharmapala yana namin pawidi bimata athulu wima. 1933 janawari 16 upasampadawa labima. 1933 aprel 29 baranasa saranathhidi apawath wima.
